abstract: The Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helú has taken the top spot in the Forbes annual ranking of the richest billionaires in the world, pushing aside the two perennial leaders, Bill Gates and Warren E. Buffett, even though all three men added greatly to their wealth over the last year.
snippet: The Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helú has taken the top spot in the Forbes annual ranking of the richest billionaires in the world, pushing aside the two perennial leaders, Bill Gates and Warren E. Buffett, even though all three men added great...
lead_paragraph: The Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helú has taken the top spot in the Forbes annual rankings of the richest billionaires in the world, pushing aside the two perennial leaders, Bill Gates and Warren E. Buffett, even though all three men added greatly to their wealth over the last year.

headline.main: Slim Tops Gates and Buffett as World’s Richest Man

abstract: Brian Moynihan can talk the talk, making a good impression in his first solo presentation since becoming chief executive of Bank of America. Walking the walk is his next challenge, Reuters Breakingviews says.
snippet: Brian Moynihan can talk the talk, making a good impression in his first solo presentation since becoming chief executive of Bank of America. Walking the walk is his next challenge, Reuters Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: Brian Moynihan can talk the talk, Reuters Breakingviews says. He made a good impression on Wednesday in his first solo presentation since becoming chief executive of Bank of America at the start of the year.

headline.main: Time for BofA’s Moynihan to Walk the Walk?

abstract: First Data, the credit card processor, said on Thursday that its chief executive has stepped down to take an advisory role at corporate owner Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.
snippet: First Data, the credit card processor, said on Thursday that its chief executive has stepped down to take an advisory role at corporate owner Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.
lead_paragraph: First Data, the credit card processor, said on Thursday that its chief executive had stepped down to take an advisory role at its corporate owner, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.

headline.main: First Data Chief to Join K.K.R. as Adviser
